casebody.data:
IN RE ZOEY H. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 12, 2018 Benjamin M. Wattenmaker, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. Evan O'Roark, assistant attorney general, in opposition.

The petition by the respondent father for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 183 Conn. App. 327 , 192 A.3d 522 (2018), is denied.

D'AURIA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
